text: Steven Zuber (born 17 August 1991) is a Swiss football player. He plays as a midfielder for A.E.K. Athens F.C. and the Switzerland national team. == References == Category:1991 births Category:Swiss footballers Category:2018 FIFA World Cup players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Sportspeople from the canton of ZÃ¼rich Category:People from Winterthur Category:Living people
